extDescription.message: Open the URLs included in selected string.

optionPageHyperlinkDesc.message: Open hyperlink in selected strings, even if it is not URL string ( Like http://irts.jp/ ).

optionPageListwindowDesc1.message: Display URL List Window before open when number of URL to open exceeds the threshold value.

optionPageListwindowDesc2.message: * If URL is image ( .jpg .bmp .png .gif ), thumbnail is displayed on URL List Window.

optionPageListwindowDesc4.message: (If you set 0, URL List Window is always displayed.)

optionPageClipboardDesc1.message: Text string in the clipboard is referred if you execute with no text select.

optionPageClipboardDesc2.message: * 'A HREF++' context menu is always displayed.

optionPageClipboardDesc3.message: Always display URL List Window when clipboard access occurs.

optionPageclipboardDesc4.message: * In order to not open carelessly if clipboard text contains many URL.

optionPageKeyboardDesc2.message: * It does not work on special page like Chrome Setting Page.

optionPageKeyboardAlert.message: Check the key for keyboard short cut.

extAlertChrome.message: It does not work on special page like Chrome Setting Page.
